summary: Creative and results-driven Software Developer with 3+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in Flutter, AI-powered applications, and scalable UI systems. Proven success in leading mobile/web products, integrating OpenAI APIs, and mentoring developers.

experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Led development of 5+ AI MVPs with OpenAI and vector databases.
Built a full AI language tutor using FlutterFlow and Firebase.
Enhanced agile task automation flows for increased efficiency.
Designed reusable UI systems for smart assistant platforms.

experience.title: Software Developer
highlights: Built and deployed Flutter mobile apps to Play Store & App Store.
Integrated GraphQL/REST APIs for real-time and modular comms.
Developed legal mediation web platform for government litigators.
Implemented CI/CD with Azure DevOps for automation.
Converted Figma designs into clean architecture UI with TDD.

projects.name: NewsForg
